mapper.insert: insert into attend values(null, #{no}, now() , null)
mapper.select: select entry_time as entryTime from attend where no = #{no} order by entry_time desc limit 1
mapper.update: update attend set leave_time = now() where no = #{no} order by attend_no desc limit 1
mapper.select: select leave_time as leaveTime from attend where no = #{no} order by leave_time desc limit 1
